thought: To craft gray_carpet, I first need to craft gray_dye. To do so, I need to place 1 black dye and 1 white dye into the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the white dye at slot 14 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1
